What Happened?
Return Home

So here's how it all went down

  • Back in February, there was a heated conversation
  • He offered and she took him up on it about 45 minutes later
  • It was officially set for April 23rd at the courthouse
  • COVID-19 happened and things got delayed
  • When things opened back up, courthouse wasn't doing weddings yet
  • She contacted her coworker, Christiana about officiating
  • They got the certificate two weeks before
  • Christiana came over with her husband Meet (he's Indian)
  • They fished
  • They grilled out
  • They signed the paperwork
  • Had awesome banana pudding for dessert
  • Turned in certificate that Monday
  • The end
